markdownRemark.html:
Salah satu koleksi pusaka Keraton Sumedang larang adalah peci beludru berhiaskan emas peninggalan masa pemerintahan Pangeran Aria Suria Atmaja (1882-1919) Peci ini dipergunakan oleh cucu Pangeran Aria Suria Atmaja ketika dikhitan. Dua buah peci tersebut berbeda dengan peci lainnya, berbahan dasar beludru dengan berhiaskan emas murni yang ditempel disekeliling sisi peci. Pangeran Aria Suria Atmaja memberikan peci ini sebaga tanda suka cita dan kasih sayang yang dalam atas dikhitannya sang cucu (R. Bestari).
Keraton Sumedang Larang memiliki warisan peci yang bernilai luhur, dapat menggambarkan kewaluyaan dan keraharjaan dari seorang Bupati Pangeran Aria Suria Atmaja atau Pangeran Mekah. Peci ini menjadi pusaka dan tersimpan di pusaka Keraton Sumedang Larang.

frontmatter.title: Peci Berhiaskan Emas Murni
frontmatter.textEnglish: A cap from the reign of the regent of Prince Aria Suria Atmaja. This cap was once worn by the grandson of Prince Aria Suria Atmaja when he was circumcised. The cap is made of black velvet with gold lining and patches. The object is an heirloom of the Sumedang Forbidden Palace. Wuseiis, the cap is solid...

frontmatter.title: Patrem
frontmatter.textEnglish: Patrem is a kind of hairpin and is a sharp weapon used by women. The shape is a kind of small knife but the shape is curved. Used as a self-defense weapon against an opponent's or enemy's attack. There is a collection of Patrem in the Heritage Museum of the Sumedang Larang Palace which is stored as a collection of women's weapons tucked in hair rolls. Women's Weapons during the Pajajaran period.

frontmatter.title: Pedang Ki Mastak
frontmatter.textEnglish: The Ki Mastak sword is a legacy from the ancestors of the Sumedang Larang kingdom, the legacy of King Taji Malela as the king of the Tembong Agung Kingdom, the forerunner of Sumedang Larang in 721-778 AD. The Ki Mastak sword is made of pure gold and is more than 14 centuries old. Now the Ki Mastak Sword is an icon of the Sumedang Larang Palace which is stored in the Sumedang Larang Palace Heritage building. We should maintain and be proud of the legacy of the Ki Mastak Sword from the Sumedang Larang ancestors.
